Coffee.description: A strong black coffee made by forcing steam through finely-ground coffee beans.
An espresso-based coffee drink that is typically prepared with equal parts double espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam.
A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.
A variant of a latte with chocolate added.
A coffee drink prepared by diluting an espresso with hot water.
Cold coffee served over ice cubes.

Tea.description: A spiced tea concentrate with steamed milk.
A latte made with matcha powder and steamed milk.
Tea that has been cooled down and served over ice.
A refreshing iced beverage made with matcha powder and sweetened milk.
A type of tea made from Camellia sinensis leaves and buds that have not undergone the same withering and oxidation process used to make oolong teas and black teas.
Iced tea flavored with lemon, often served with sugar or sweetener.

Soda.description: A carbonated soft drink containing caffeine and usually flavored with vanilla, cinnamon, lemon, or lime.
A carbonated soft drink flavored with ginger.
A sweet carbonated soft drink traditionally made using the root bark of the sassafras tree as the primary flavoring.

Juice.description: A beverage consisting of various fruit juices mixed with soda or water.
A beverage made from squeezed or pressed oranges.

Other.description: A heated drink consisting of shaved chocolate, melted chocolate, or cocoa powder, heated milk or water, and usually a sweetener.
A sweet, cold beverage that is usually made from milk, ice cream, and/or flavorings or sweeteners such as fruit syrup or chocolate sauce.
Clear, colorless, odorless, and tasteless liquid that is essential for most living organisms.
